h2_title: Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Monk from the Sea
content: Before heading down the main stairs to a fearsome looking foe, head all the way around to the far stairs, which leads to another small building where two Thunder Rhino Masters overlook the enemy below. You'll want to take them out so they can't give him support.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'New_Thunderclap_Temple_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'New Thunderclap Temple Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Monk from the Sea'.
The content is as follows:
Before heading down the main stairs to a fearsome looking foe, head all the way around to the far stairs, which leads to another small building where two Thunder Rhino Masters overlook the enemy below. You'll want to take them out so they can't give him support.
